price: 83. Then We saved him and his family, except his wife; she was of those who remained behind (in the torment).
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
